name: DDI - Learner Portal & Analytics Platform Development
description: Integrated learning and HR services portal with unified analytics platform addressing data engineering needs for one of the biggest human resources and leadership development consultancy in USA.
challenge: Lack of application and process-related documentation, limited flexibility in customizing assessments and development journeys, lack of consistency in Agile development processes across projects, and need for scalable data infrastructure.
solution: Unified URL for all clients with SSO and credential-based login
Content flagging system to notify users of new or outdated materials
Unified Analytics Platform on Azure Databricks with multiple data sources
Power BI dashboards for data visualization across all sources
360-degree view of clients, products, and interactions

impact.dataAccuracy: 10x improved with faster execution of data pipelines
impact.scalabilityImprovement: On demand and auto scalable execution

outcomes: Reduced manual effort by 40% through unified URL access and automation
Minimized risk of overlooking essential trainings
10x improvement in data accuracy with faster pipeline execution
30% reduction in data infrastructure costs using serverless compute
Unified analytics platform enhanced with integrated data sources
